players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's be cautious and keep an eye on each other to ensure we don't lose any more valuable members of our team."
You: "I agree with Bob's sentiment of keeping a close eye on everyone. It's important that we work together as a team to ensure the safety and survival of all members."
You: "Let's continue to work together and keep each other informed of any suspicious activities or observations. We can't afford to lose any more team members."

Bob: "Let's not jump to conclusions based on the recent events. We need to remain calm and collected in order to make informed decisions as a team. It's important that we trust each other and communicate openly about any suspicions or concerns we may have."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice
